Package org.cesecore.certificates.certificate

Class BaseCertificateData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.dbprotection.ProtectedData
      • org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.BaseCertificateData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CertificateData, NoConflictCertificateData
    public abstract class BaseCertificateData
extends ProtectedData
    Used as base class for NoConflictCertificateData and CertificateData to group the common logic for those entites
    Version:
    $Id: ProtectedCertificateData.java 28264 2018-04-09 15:56:54Z tarmo $

      • getNotBefore

        public abstract Long getNotBefore()
        Returns:
        the number of milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 GMT until the certificate was issued or null if the information is not known.

      • getExpireDate

        public abstract long getExpireDate()
        Returns:
        the number of milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 GMT until the certificate expires.

      • getRevocationReason

        public abstract int getRevocationReason()
        Set to revocation reason if status == CERT_REVOKED
        Returns:
        revocation reason, RevokedCertInfo.NOT_REVOKED etc
        See Also:
        etc

      • getRevocationDate

        public abstract long getRevocationDate()
        Set to date when revocation occured if status == CERT_REVOKED. Format == Date.getTime()
        Returns:
        revocation date

      • getBase64Cert

        public String getBase64Cert​(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        Return the certificate. From this table if contained here. From {link Base64CertData} if contained there.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - To be used if the cert is in the Base64CertData table.
        Returns:
        The certificate

      • getCertificate

        public Certificate getCertificate​(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        Returns the certificate as an object.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - EM
        Returns:
        The certificate or null if it doesn't exist or is blank/null in the database

      • getCertificate

        public Certificate getCertificate​(Base64CertData base64CertData)
        Returns the certificate as an object.
        Parameters:
        base64CertData - data
        Returns:
        The certificate or null if it doesn't exist or is blank/null in the database

      • getSerialNumberHex

        public String getSerialNumberHex()
                          throws NumberFormatException
        Serialnumber formated as BigInteger.toString(16).toUpperCase(), or just as it is in DB if not encodable to hex.
        Returns:
        serial number in hex format
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - if badly formatted

      • getEndEntityProfileIdOrZero

        public int getEndEntityProfileIdOrZero()
        Returns:
        the end entity profile this certificate was issued under or 0 if the information is not available.

      • getSubjectDnNeverNull

        public String getSubjectDnNeverNull()
        DN of subject in certificate
        Returns:
        subject dn. If it is null, return empty string

      • equalsStatus

        public boolean equalsStatus​(BaseCertificateData certificateData,
                            boolean strict)
        Compare the status field of this and another CertificateData object.
        Parameters:
        certificateData - data
        strict - will treat NOTIFIED as ACTIVE and ARCHIVED as REVOKED if set to false
        Returns:
        status
